related_post.text: so this may be a stupid question but.. here we go:so im currently at my cousin\'s place for the next couple weeks and I wanna game. Problem is I cant carry my desktop along (of course) so I carried along a laptop I use for presentations and such. now the laptop isnt bad but its not gaming material 4gb ram etc.. I have an android smartphone with 8GB RAM so I\'m wondering if its possible to somehow do some distributed computing thing where the PC uses the Phone\'s inbuilt RAM. when I googled it most people were like just dont do it but can I get a better answer? Because I remember I saw someone build a PC with multiple RasPis so it seems like it should be possible
